quest.name: Underneath the Starry Lights
journal:
Managingway doesn't take lights lightly.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the glaring Loporrit in the Carrotorium.
Deliver the requested items to Managingway.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: The multicolored blaze of our musicking station is quite dazzling, don't you agree? Whenever I wander over, I feel as though I've entered an exhilarating new cosmos.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Yet beautiful as our lights are, they must receive proper maintenance lest their brilliance be dimmed by time.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Luckily, I have found a Way well suited to preserving our lights' healthy glare. He should be gathering materials for spare parts in the Carrotorium─might you go and lend him your assistance?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04692
dialogue.text: ...What? Oh. You're the one Managingway sent. Pieces for the lights. Right.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04692
dialogue.text: Here. See if you can make any metal conductors with these. I have more if you run out.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04692
dialogue.text: Here. See if you can make any cosmetic attachments with these. I have more if you run out.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04692
dialogue.text: Here. See if you can make any internal conductors with these. I have more if you run out.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04692
dialogue.text: I have other things to do, so take what you make back to Managingway.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04692
dialogue.text: ...Can I help you? Then maybe we can work in silence.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04692
dialogue.text: ...Can I help you? Then maybe we can work in silence.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04692
dialogue.text: ...Can I help you? Then maybe we can work in silence.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: How does your work proceed on the spare parts for our lights?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Excellent! Just what we needed. I shall update our list of inventory immediately.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: In addition to providing the perfect ambience in which to hop, our lighting was designed with certain symbolism in mind. The smaller lights are scattered about as stars, and the mirror balls...well, they represent Etheirys, of course!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Every star is precious and every light a beacon of hope. I do hope you will continue helping us preserve our little cosmos, Forename!
